name: \ACCESS GRANTED\
description:
\ACCESS GRANTED\

Lets you take the seat of a hacker, and to lead the rebellion against Corporation X. You're going up against the world's toughest big-tech corp and the only thing you need is your hands, and wits. But mostly hands.

How To Play: The only things you need are your mouse to click on, keyboard to mash on, and energy drinks to gulp down on. Corporation X has tough security, and you're going to need speed to penetrate their defenses before they realise you're infiltrating them.

\ACCESS GRANTED\ is a jam submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, themed: Let there be Chaos! As the game progresses, the game becomes chaotic and it's up to the player to manage it or be overrun!

Credits where they are due:

Kenney for some of his assets.

@polygitsune for her artwork!

@TheGlassHouse for his music!

hackertyper.net for their awesome movie-dramatic text to use!

David Libeau for his font, "Hacked" used for title screen!
